title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Networked Collaborative Learning for School Leadership Expertise Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational leadership theory and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real school operation cases to propose three human resource management strategies.
Through feedback sessions with peer leaders, learners can derive two lesson improvement strategies.
Learners can develop one conflict management protocol through network-based problem-solving activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
